alien4cloud.rest.utils

Class JsonUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • alien4cloud.rest.utils.JsonUtil

  • public final class JsonUtil
extends Object
    Simple utility for JSon processing.

        public static <T> RestResponse<T> read(String responseAsString,
                                       Class<T> dataType)
                                throws IOException
        Parse a RestResponse by using the specified dataType as the expected data object's class.
        Parameters:
        responseAsString - The RestResponse as a JSon String
        dataType - The type of the data object.
        Returns:
        The parsed RestResponse object matching the given JSon.
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of an IO error.
